body.name: kaltagled Light Bulb Security Camera 3MP, WiFi 2.4G&5G Security Outdoor &Indoor Camera, Home 360°Surveillance Cam with Motion Detection Alarm Night Vision Light Socket Security Camera Two-Way Audio
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 3 hrs 13 mins
features: 【2.4Ghz And 5Ghz Wifi Light Bulb Security Camera】 This Wireless Wifi Light Bulb Security Camera Supports 2.4Ghz And 5Ghz Double-Band Network Routers.Compared With Other Cameras On The Market That Only Support 2.4Ghz, Our Camera Can Give You More Wireless Wifi Options And Control Your Camera More Smoothly. You Can Use The App To Control The Wireless Wifi Light Bulb Security Camera Viewing Angle To Achieve 360-Degree Viewing Without Blind Spots.

【 Easy Installation Bulb Camera】The light bulb security camera is a true wireless camera that is easy to install and operate. Simply screw it into a light socketand no additional power supply is required, making the installation process effortless. The item needs to be inserted into the E27 lamp head. The bulb camera is equipped with a light socket extender and conversion head inside each package.

【HD 2K 3MP And Night Vision】Light Bulb Security Camera Outdoor Wifi 2K Hd Bulb Security Camera Can Provide A Clear Picture .This surveillance camera can control the viewing angle through the APP, you can view it remotely anytime and anywhere through the APP, even in complete darkness, you can view clear images.

【Motion Detection And Real-time Alerts】This light socket security camera uses a high-sensitivity motion sensor, which can be rotated 355 degrees and 90 degrees up and down. Once the camera detects a moving object after connecting it to the Internet, it will automatically record the motion picture and notify you through the APP. Which greatly ensures safety.

【Two-Way Audio】Our Light Bulb Security Camera also has two-way audio and an alarm siren feature. It enables users to talk with family or visitors through their mobile phones, set an audible alarm to scare away uninvited guests and welcome guests.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Light Bulb Socket Security Camera - Security Camera Indoor Wireless for Pet Camera, 355 °Panorama Light Bulb Camera with Motion Detection 2.4GHz &5Ghz wifi 3MP light bulb camera light scoket camera for your family Power Supply: E27 socket 110-240VPixel: 2k/3 millionCommunication method: 2.4GHz &5GHz wifiViewing angle: 355° (horizontal)/95° (vertical) Storage: up to 128G SD cardAudio: Two-way audioMotion detection: supportAlert Notification: SupportNight vision function: infrared + full-color night visionSupported mobile systems: Android/IOS
Two-Way Audio Talk-You can have a conversation between you and your visitor or family members

Easy To Install ,Just Like To Install A Light Bulb How to Connect the light bulb camera to your phone? 1. Install the "P6SLite" App and create an account.2. Keep the lightbulb camera power on and press the Reset Button by the pin at least for 5 Seconds until you hear the sound that the reset is successful.3. Turn on the Bluetooth of the mobile phone, keep the light bulb camera power on, and add a new device, it will automatically search for the camera, enter the wifi user name and password, and click "Next" to automatically connect.4. Light bulb camera device scans the App QR code to add-please face the QR code directly to the camera lens and keep a distance of about 15cm. The Device will emit a notification sound after scanning the QR code successfully5. Install the light bulb security camera in the desired location:6. After the lightbulb camera and mobile phone are paired, you can install the camera light bulb to the other E27 bulbs base without connecting the bulb camera to the mobile phone again.NOTE:1. If the camera light bulb connected to the phone failed, please keep the lightbulb camera power on and press the Reset Button of the camera, and then try again Wifi settings.2. Light bulb camera should power on and connect to 2.4GHz WiFi or 5GHz WiFi.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Clear picture. Easy to use. Night vision is great. All around great product! Highly recommended!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera!
reviews.reviewText: I really like these light bulb cameras, that I call them! They have most of the bells and whistles that the expensive brands have, if not more! You can even talk thru them. They have very good picture, you can move it around with the app on your phone, to see everything. I have mine adjusted so I don't pickup all the traffic and send you endless false alarms. There is a lot I have probably not figured out with them yet, but I'm working on it! I highly recommend! Great price also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Couldn't get it to connect
reviews.reviewText: I spent maybe 45 minutes first with a magnifying lens for their paper instructions with no luck. Switched to phone only instructions off their app, no luck. Got on their Amazon sales site for easiest instructions & still not possible. I tried setting it up while standing on a ladder & using the light fixture it would be permanently placed in, no luck. Brought it back inside (had the have my paper with internet code & password outside on a windy day along with the pin they give you to reset) & took apart a lamp, connected the device & when I went to reset, the tiny pin couldn't find the dot inside to push. Guessing one of the 3 previous times I already reset it with the pin, broke the plastic, hidden reset spot inside. By the time I'm done with this it will have been over an hour of my time wasted unable to set this "easy set up" security 'bulb'. I couldn't get it to read the QR code the LAST TIME it shows one on my Apple phone. Yes. I know how far 15cm is. I teach science/math & the metrics system is superior to the mess we Americans have to use. It said it was 'simple' & if it had read the QR codes easily it probably would have been. I couldn't get the first QR code to read either but at least that one had a 2nd method on my phone screen to use whereas the last one that kept me on a ladder for 10 min. tilting & moving my phone at various distances & angles wouldn't. (There was one QR code that registered easily....) Very discouraging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The light bulb security camera is easy to install and easy to use. I bought this type of security camera because I didn't have to do anything more than screw in the device to the existing outdoor light. It is easy to connect to your wifi and start using the camera. I also like that it has a normal light built in. Using the app to use the camera is simple and has a clear view of the area it is covering. You can't beat the quality you get for the price you pay. I will be buying another for the back side of my home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nonexistent customer service, but camera is OK for the price.
reviews.reviewText: 0 Customer service. No way to reach them except email, they refuse to answer. The app is horrible, barely works. It took me a couple of days before it was accepting of my phone number, they will NOT help you in any way. The camera itself has a pretty good picture quality, night vision is good. There's no way to zoom out, only in so on my front porch it will only get the top of peoples heads, not the face. But it will read my license plate in front of the house so that is one good thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Love These
reviews.reviewText: They work perfectly and are just as described. This is a purchase I wish I would have made sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars These Don't Work Good Without A Subscription
reviews.reviewText: This company read my review and gave me a refund because I was so disappointed. I thought thatwas very generous. I really hope they consider what I have said about the bulb camera and changethe way the bulb camera works.Thank you for the refund. I will go from a terrible 1 star rating to a 2 star.I am specifically searching for a light bulb camera that works without a subscription. One thatI can put in my SD card and view and erase videos without taking the card in and out.These Don't Work Good Without A Subscription.It would not work correctly with an SD card. Kept trying to force a subscription. You can not control SD card, (remove videos) without taking it out of the device. I believe they all work this way so I am not trying anymore of these. I have tried 2. If that doesn't bother you, the picture was really good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't pass on this!!!!
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to set up and start using. We have had full systems in the past, which ended up having issues after set up. This has done everything advertised and with ease. You will want to purchase a couple to work several areas. We are going to purchase more for ourselves and gifts in the future as well. Don't wait, get them now!!
